name: CLM_OTHER_DXS
description: Other diagnoses on the claim. This is for professional billing claims only.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the claim information record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OTHER_DX_ID
columns.description: The other diagnosis IDs on the claim.
